title: Discord Community and Bot | Documentation | Mastra
text:
The Discord server has over 1000 members and serves as the main discussion forum for Mastra. The Mastra team monitors Discord during North American and European business hours, with community members active across other time zones. Join the Discord serverâ€‰. 
 Discord MCP Bot 
 In addition to community members, we have an (experimental!) Discord bot that can also help answer questions. It uses Model Context Protocol (MCP). You can ask it a question with /ask (either in public channels or DMs) and clear history (in DMs only) with /cleardm. Licensing
